SELECT DATE_FORMAT(VISIT_TIME,'%Y-%m') DAILY, COUNT(*) VISIT FROM VISITOR WHERE VISIT_TIME BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY DAILY ORDER BY DAILY
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ORDERS_ORDER_DATE,'%Y-%m') DAILY, SUM(ORDERS_PAYMENT) SALES FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDERS_ORDER_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY DAILY ORDER BY DAILY;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ORDERS_ORDER_DATE,'%Y-%m') DAILY, COUNT(*) ORDERS FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDERS_ORDER_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY DAILY ORDER BY DAILY;
